content.question: In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable.a) Describe one process that led to German industrialization in the nineteenth century.b) Explain one reason why much of eastern and southern Europe lagged behind western and central Europe in the process of industrialization.c) Describe one political effect of industrialization in nineteenth-century Europe.

topic.text: 6.2: The Spread of Industry Throughout Europe

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
